info.name: bilibili.tv dark theme
info.description:
A dark theme for bilibili.tv ONLY 😎🥶😍😘🤦‍♂️💪😊🙏

Supports:
- bilibili.tv
- studio.bilibili.tv

Found a bug?
Tell me here👉 : https://forms.gle/jTJRFBrkbrHJ97vd9
